rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious Bohemian living area with eclectic decor and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with traditional elements and efficient workflow adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An inviting dining space for family meals with ample seating and natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious bedroom featuring Bohemian decor and a private balcony oriented towards the east as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with light colors and natural textures.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A functional bedroom designed for multi-purpose use including storage.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: An elegantly tiled bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with modern fixtures.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed for productivity, positioned in a quiet corner of the house as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A serene library space with ample shelving and soft lighting, placed in a quiet area of the house.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A well-equipped private gym with a focus on natural ventilation and soundproofing.
